shieldSetupPrepareFactors_intro_subtitle: You need at least **2 factors** to build a Security Shield. 1 of your factors must be a hardware device.
A future wallet update will enable Shields without needing a hardware device.
shieldSetupPrepareFactors_addHardwareFac: Choose a hardware device to use as a security factor in your Shield.
shieldSetupPrepareFactors_addAnotherFact: You need to add **1 more factor** to begin building your Shield.
Choosing a mnemonic is only recommended for advanced users
shieldSetupPrepareFactors_completion_sub: Before it’s finished, you’ll have the chance to review it and make any changes.
